actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

official_title: To provide for an annual statement of accrued liability of the Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Program.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Federal budget law to require the President, in the annual budget submission to the Congress, to include a statement of the current accrued liabilities of the Federal Government for future benefits under the Old Age and Survivors Insurance Program (title II of the Social Security Act).

titles.title: To provide for an annual statement of accrued liability of the Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Program.
